Plot: In 2017, John Henry Brennick and his wife Karen are captured at a US immigration point with an illegal baby during population control. The resulting prison experience is the subject of the ...
Title: Fortress
Writer: Troy Neighbors (story), Steven Feinberg (story), Troy Neighbors (screenplay), Steven Feinberg (screenplay), David Venable (screenplay), Terry Curtis Fox (screenplay)
